game.name: Monster Truck Stunts Sky Driving
game.description:
The biggest fun and thrill treat are here for the monster truck driving fans! Are you one of them? Join Monster Truck Stunts Sky Driving and be prepared to ride your favorite vehicle on the platforms that are made in the sky! Does not it sound pretty amazing and challenging? Yes, only those who have amazing hand-eye coordination and driving abilities will dare to try it out. Choose your truck and get ready to drive up in the sky that is full of obstacles!

Ride your vehicle like a bird and roam like a cloud, win the race, and show off the world that you are a true racer! When you are in the real world, you cannot get a chance to fly your truck. However, in the virtual world, you can make your dream come true by browsing this amazing brand new racing game. Drive your truck through the difficult and tricky tracks prepared with the help of containers in the sky!

Remember your racing track is available at 10,000 meters above the ground so be careful while driving your truck. Be ready to face off the deadly oil drums in the truck and find your way towards victory in this HTML5 truck game! Avoid all of the obstacles carefully and try to reach the end as fast as you can to score higher! With awesome stunts, entertaining gameplay, and easy controls, you are sure to keep you engrossed for hours. Good luck to clear all unique and thrilling 20 levels like a pro!
